Windy, v0.15.4

Windy provides a collection of classes, which allow a class based approach of handling windows, monitors, etc.

Following classes exist: * Mony - Single Monitor * Mousy - Mouse * MultiMony - Multi Monitor Environments * Pointy - Points (geometric 2D-points) - this is mostly a helper class being used within this package, but maybe helpful anyway ...  * Recty - Rectangles (consisting of two points) -  - this is mostly a helper class being used within this package, but maybe helpful anyway ...  * Windy - Windows * WindLy - Collection (List) of Windows

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original
